eventParts.text: Oh no, look at all those vultures!
They’re heading our way! Quick, let’s hide!
Hey, have any of you guys heard about Percy?
Last I heard he was still in prison.
Is it really true he had a relationship with a bird?
That’s what I heard anyway! I don’t know why the king would throw him in jail otherwise, he was a good dude.
If he was a good dude, would be really date a bird?
I dunno. Do you guys ever think that… maybe birds aren’t that bad after all?
Looks like that was the last of them.
I-I… Yes, he is. Please, don’t - don’t be angry.

eventConsequence.selectionText: We’re not angry at you, Kim! I don’t really understand how you got a vulture boyfriend, but if he’s been imprisoned because of it I still think we should save him!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Oh feathers, thank you so much! Thank you, thank you!

Kim gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: You’ve got a vulture boyfriend? How did that happen? I guess we can still save him, but it feels kinda strange.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Uhm, thanks... I would really appreciate it if we could find him. 

Kim gains +2 caution and +1 solitude!
